name: Deep Sleep (SjoerdThaGamer)
description:
This is a text adventure game about a person who wakes up and realises he isn't in the real world anymore. AKA he's in coma.

Features:

  • TEXT
  • ADVENTURE
  • Startup screen
  • Menu screen
  • Multiple lifes
  • Creepy little girl
  • 3 different endings
  • Unlockables (not really, just a password for extra content)
  • It's a text adventure horror game!

The game is of decent to good quality. The package contains another rar file with an amazingly professional (<-- sarcasm) drawn map, a couple of cheats and a brief walkthrough for each individual ending.
